name: flower power bucket hat
sizes_available: one size to fit head circumference: 21" [53.5 cm]
notes:
flowers are in bloom on this cute crochet hat that comes together so easily! stitching in 100% cotton lily sugar'n cream, this bucket hat is made by working motifs to form the sides, then attaching a top, and finally working a brim along the bottom edge. shake things up by swapping out colors to suit your tastes. it's a fun pattern for working motifs, crocheting in the round, doing color changes, and practicing basic increase techniques.

yarns for model:
lily® sugar’n cream™ (2.5 oz/70.9 g; 120 yds/109 m)
main color (mc) robin’s egg (01215 1 ball
contrast a hot green (01712) 1 ball
contrast b soft ecru (01004) 1 ball
